# regionOfInterest

**Instance Property**

The area in the video frame in which the dock accessory tracks a subject.

## Declaration

```swift
final var regionOfInterest: CGRect { get }
```

## Performing animation

- **animate(motion:)**: Starts an animation sequence.
- **setRegionOfInterest(_:)**: Sets the area in the video frame in which the dock accessory tracks a subject.
- **DockAccessory.Animation**: Character animations that describe how to move the dock accessory.
